title: Cant download the game
body: Error 1935 occurs when I try to download the game I need help to fix this. It could be due to Microsoft visual C++ 2005? but I really don't know how to fix it

replies.body: This error usually happens with reformatting or rigs that don't have their Windows updated yet.  You're missing some products necessary for downloading, which you can manually [download here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) or perform a windows update.  Hope that helps!
